JobFullDesc: Do you have a passion for building powerfully simple and highly engaging user experiences? Do you have a nose for finding opportunities to drive growth within a vast ocean of data? Are you happiest sitting at the intersection of data, design, and experimentation? We do and would love to talk with you about joining the Teams Platform Engagement Team! We build user experiences that seamlessly integrate ecosystem apps into the core workflows our customers use every day with the goal of making Teams the best way for people to collaborate.  We are looking for a strong, data-driven & growth-oriented Product Manager with a track record of building high-impact user experiences spanning mobile, tablet, and desktop devices. In this role you will have many opportunities to work directly with customers, partners, developers, and other stakeholders to shape our strategy to durably increase end-user engagement with ecosystem applications. Ideal candidates will have excellent written communication skills, a deep passion for working with both data-scientists and product designers, and an unstoppable drive for shipping to customers. What is working on Microsoft Teams like? We're a fast-moving environment that lets us explore, iterate, and deliver value to customers.  We share an immense passion for the customer and user experiences that surprise and delight the people that use them, and there are numerous opportunities to present ideas and work directly with executives and customers to collect feedback that directly impacts the product. While we innovate and move at a fast pace, we're also a team that likes to have fun, and we build that attitude into our product.  Our culture is open, respectful, and empowering - we believe that listening to all voices is key to the success of our product and our team. ResponsibilitiesProvide UX-focused thought leadership to grow end-user engagement & satisfaction with 3rd party integrations in Teams. Work closely with design – empowering them to push the boundaries on user experiences built on top of Platform capabilities. Operationalize & execute with engineering to deliver frequent experimentation & larger, strategic UX investments. Engage with customers and internal partners to internalize their business and product goals & create alignment. Regularly present new product plans, demos, competitive reviews, and more to the leadership team. Contributetothe overall product strategy and roadmap while executing.  Qualifications6 or more years of program/product management experience building front-end user experiences.Keen focus on UX, design, and scenario-thinking with a strong track record of successful collaboratio with the design discipline.Highly organized, data and detail oriented working style.   Innate curiosity and ability to thrive in ambiguous andrapidly changingstartup environment. Self-starters and innovators with a positive, collaborative can-do attitude and biasforaction are very welcome. Experience across the entire product lifecycle from project inception to ship & iterate in production.    Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer.
